Class NPCPavan

java.lang.Object
  Character
      NPC
          NPCPavan

public class NPCPavan
extends NPC

NPCPavan extends NPC. Pavan allows our hero to increase any of his stats, without paying anything in return. Essentially, he is the god of my universe. You are lucky if you encounter him. This class realizes the 3 abstract methods of the NPC super class. When our hero encounters an NPC, the interface will always provide a description of the NPC and allow the hero to talk or barter with the NPC.

Constructor Summary

          Default constructor only.

          Runs a barter sequence between the Hero object and Pavan.
 String describe()
          Returns a description of Pavan.

Constructor Detail

NPCPavan

public NPCPavan()
Default constructor only. NPCPavan is always constructed as "Pavan".

Method Detail

barter

public void barter(Hero h)
Runs a barter sequence between the Hero object and Pavan. Our hero may choose to increase any of his stats, free of cost. Since the dialogue is handled within this object, a reference to the Hero object must be passed in such that the methods of our Hero object are also accessible.

Specified by:
barter in class NPC

describe

public String describe()
Returns a description of Pavan. Used to introduce the character.

Specified by:
describe in class NPC

talk

public void talk(Hero h)
Runs a dialogue between the Hero object and Pavan. Since the dialogue is handled within this object, a reference to the Hero object must be passed in such that the methods of our Hero object are also accessible.

Specified by:
talk in class NPC
